column5: After reading the article in this months OC, my buddy and I rigged up and hit the Grand. It took about an hour to figure out what we were doing but then we got into them. Finished the day with 8 the biggest being 10.3lbs.   Mark
nice meow!... I still havent catch that big.. maybe this year
Great day!  Definitely have your hands full when they get over the 10lb mark

I would like to catch a large one in the summer and see how the fight, in the cool water I find they have a lot less energy. In the summer in London I catch small channel cats and they have more power then the large 15+ ones I got in the spring.

the bigger ones dont have as much fight to them as a smaller fish. a 10lb cat will fight harder then a 20lb cat.  u just get more weight to move with the bigger fish, they tend to be more stubborn. like to hold bottom more, and just use their size to work your rod. where as the smaller fish, will shake and run around more on u.
Dunville just got really busy with boats for the weekend. lol.  Some fine fishing dood!

I've caught cats close to 20lb and I certainly agree with this. Also I do think water temps play a role too. Despite the nice weather the rivers are still cold, once they warm up a bit I find the fish have a bit more energy.  Nice fish bigworm. They're fun to chase once in a while.
Those are some nice looking cats. I love The grand river catfishin some days its a catfish every cast!
Thanks for the report. I will head down soon. I like to see reports from OFNrs to verify that the run really has started.
Nice Report, I'm hoping to get down at least once, but the Trout are fun up here too, 2 rainbows & 3 Browns between 4 of us yesterday Tight Lines SBK
Can you fish the lower river with a canoe safely?
Yes, canoe on the lower is fine. Just be smart when being up towards the dam

I received an email thru the night from a Shawn Friesner inviting a bunch of guys to go fish thease Dunville Cats , any one know who this is ? .... i don't but who ever he is thank you for the invite and i have no idea where Dunville is ........lol .
lol....who cares who he is? as long as he invited you to go fishing that's good enough for me
